summary: 2002 F250 FROM J.C.FORD RETURNED FOR SERVICE THE TWO FRONT TIRES WAS DAMAGED BY SOMEONE IN THE SERVICE DEPARTMENT WHEN I WENT TO TELL THE SERVICE MANAGER MY PROBLEM HE REMARKED WE DID NOT DO THAT AND WOULD NOT TALK TO ME ABOUT IT. I WILL NEVER TAKE  ANY VEHICLE BACK TO THEM FOR ANY REASON. NOR WILL I BUY ANOTHER FORD. THIS IS NOT A COMPLAINT ABOUT FORD BUT ABOUT THE SERVICE DEPARTMENT AT J.C. LEWIS FORD.   *NLM
